text: Grey has been my go-to hair stylist for coming to 10 years. When I ask for advise for certain hairstyles she would assist to prepare a decent amount of balance so the hairstyle I wanted would fit onto my face shape. Communication when scheduling appointments have been on time as well! Highly recommend!

Always frequent the hair salon despite the fact I donâ€™t live near because Grey hair cut is good. It fits my overall look and is always a joy to have conversation with her during the process. Another thing I enjoy Ejean is the old school Master Q comic, it just relive my childhood days haha

Grey have been my long time hairstylist since many many years ago. I have followed her since her previous salon at Hougang to current salon at E-Jean at Pasir Ris. I know she have many other customers also same like me, follow her since her previous workplace. This shows how good she is. Grey is very friendly and accomodating. You can be sure your hair is in good hands with her. The other staffs at E-Jean salon are also friendly and nice. Highly recommended!

Recently chanced upon E-Jean @ Elias Mall and saw numerous good reviews about the salon itself. Decided to pay the place a visit and had my hair cut with Grey herself, and I never once regretted it. She is professional, amicable and sincere. On top of that, her techniques are superb and I love how my hair turned out everytime under her hands. You can expect tons of joy and laughter during the process too. Totally enjoyed my time and highly recommend anyone new to try her out!

Service done by: Alvin

Cutting and washing. Very meticulous with work as he takes note of every details. He also recommends many different hairstyle when I asked. He also remembers the previous time when he cuts my hair.

Very good customer service and excellent skills.
